about_the_game:
TSUNDERE MILFIN - Artbook- contains art, lines, and early character sketches. All art and animations are available in the Gallery with the highest quality. If you liked the game, you can learn more about what the work on the characters looked like. Want to support us!? Thank you!

♥Features♥:

  • Arts in the highest resolution
  • Lines and early character sketches
  • Our thanks and appreciation to you ♥

♥After purchase♥

After download DLC, you'll find the Artbook in your game's directory folder:
TSUNDERE MILFIN in your Steam library, right - click it, then click "Properties", select the "Local Files" tab, and click "Browse Local Files"
After that, just open your Artbook folder and enjoy it.
Thanks for your support! ❤️

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Mature imagery, Sexual Content.

Users can meet characters in the game where they are in suggestive poses.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0+ Compatible Card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
